title: From Husband to Futa: A Gender Swapping Tale of Total Submission to a Billionaire Domme
description: Jenny is a dominating alpha, and her husband, Derek, loves her more than anything for that. The problem is, things just aren't clicking for them in the bedroom, despite all of Derek's efforts. But today, he found a magic ring, a gift for Jenny who uses it to gain immense wealth. Only, before Derek can show her the ring, he makes an unintentional wish and learns a great deal about what Jenny really wants from a partner in the bedroom. Can he learn to love his new feminine body? And will he still love Jenny after she gets her hands on the ring... and on him?From Husband to Futa is a fun tale of total submission and wish fulfillment, with BDSM and a strong woman who knows exactly what she wants out of life.
author: Beatrice Evenmorne
